languages.text: Служители Кровавой паутины торжественно помещают кости в носовую обшивку, а экипаж с трепетом наблюдает за священнодейством. Бог-Император послал им могучего духа-защитника.
The servants of the Bloodspun Web solemnly place the bones in the bow plating while the crew watches the sacred ceremony with awe. The God-Emperor has sent them a mighty spirit protector.
languages.original_text: Служители Кровавой паутины торжественно помещают кости в носовую обшивку, а экипаж с трепетом наблюдает за священнодейством. Бог-Император послал им могучего духа-защитника.

languages.text: Die Diener des Blutgesponnenen Netzes platzieren die Knochen feierlich in der Bugpanzerung, während die Crew die heilige Zeremonie ehrfurchtsvoll verfolgt. Der Gottimperator hat ihnen einen mächtigen Beschützergeist geschickt.
languages.original_text: The servants of the Bloodspun Web solemnly place the bones in the bow plating while the crew watches the sacred ceremony with awe. The God-Emperor has sent them a mighty spirit protector.

traits.locale_text: Die Diener des Blutgesponnenen Netzes platzieren die Knochen feierlich in der Bugpanzerung, während die Crew die heilige Zeremonie ehrfurchtsvoll verfolgt. Der Gottimperator hat ihnen einen mächtigen Beschützergeist geschickt.

languages.text: Les serviteurs de la Toile de Sang placent solennellement les ossements sous la coque, au niveau de la proue, tandis que l'équipage observe révérencieusement la cérémonie sacrée. L'Empereur-Dieu leur a envoyé un puissant protecteur spirituel.
languages.original_text: The servants of the Bloodspun Web solemnly place the bones in the bow plating while the crew watches the sacred ceremony with awe. The God-Emperor has sent them a mighty spirit protector.

traits.locale_text: Les serviteurs de la Toile de Sang placent solennellement les ossements sous la coque, au niveau de la proue, tandis que l'équipage observe révérencieusement la cérémonie sacrée. L'Empereur-Dieu leur a envoyé un puissant protecteur spirituel.

languages.text: Los sirvientes de la Red Sanguinolenta colocan solemnemente los huesos en el blindaje de proa mientras la tripulación observa asombrada la ceremonia. El Dios Emperador ha enviado un poderoso espíritu protector.
languages.original_text: The servants of the Bloodspun Web solemnly place the bones in the bow plating while the crew watches the sacred ceremony with awe. The God-Emperor has sent them a mighty spirit protector.

traits.locale_text: Los sirvientes de la Red Sanguinolenta colocan solemnemente los huesos en el blindaje de proa mientras la tripulación observa asombrada la ceremonia. El Dios Emperador ha enviado un poderoso espíritu protector.

languages.text: ブラッドスパン・ウェブの従者たちは、クルーたちが畏敬の念をもって儀式を見守る中、粛々と骨を船首のプレートへと納める。神帝陛下は彼らに強大な魂の守護者を遣わせたのだ。
languages.original_text: The servants of the Bloodspun Web solemnly place the bones in the bow plating while the crew watches the sacred ceremony with awe. The God-Emperor has sent them a mighty spirit protector.

traits.locale_text: ブラッドスパン・ウェブの従者たちは、クルーたちが畏敬の念をもって儀式を見守る中、粛々と骨を船首のプレートへと納める。神帝陛下は彼らに強大な魂の守護者を遣わせたのだ。

languages.text: 织血罗网的仆人庄严地将遗骨安置在了舰艏，而船员们则怀着敬畏的心情，观看了这场神圣的仪式。神皇为他们派来了一位强大的灵魂守卫。
languages.original_text: The servants of the Bloodspun Web solemnly place the bones in the bow plating while the crew watches the sacred ceremony with awe. The God-Emperor has sent them a mighty spirit protector.

traits.locale_text: 织血罗网的仆人庄严地将遗骨安置在了舰艏，而船员们则怀着敬畏的心情，观看了这场神圣的仪式。神皇为他们派来了一位强大的灵魂守卫。

languages.text: Kanipi Ağı hizmetkârları, kemikleri ciddiyetle pruva kaplamasına yerleştirirken mürettebat da kutsal töreni huşu içinde izliyor. Tanrı İmparator, onlara kudretli bir koruyucu ruh bahşetti.
languages.original_text: The servants of the Bloodspun Web solemnly place the bones in the bow plating while the crew watches the sacred ceremony with awe. The God-Emperor has sent them a mighty spirit protector.
